column1: Little Goat Diner////I've been here for brunch several times and finally came to try dinner. So good!! Their brunch items
column3: are unique twists on traditional diner staples. Everything I've had
column4: both from the breakfast list and the lunch/dinner list
column5: was terrific. They are also very kid-friendly! If you're going for lunch or dinner
column6: I HIGHLY recommend the sloppy goat. It's delicious!
